Pre-Installation

Download

  1. Download Raspberry Pi OS iso for arm64 architecture:
    • Raspberry Pi OS (64-bit) â‡’ Raspberry Pi OS Lite
  2. Decompress disk image file: 

    $ xz -vd <RASPBERRY-PI-OS.xz>

Flash Installation Media

  1. Make sure the installation media filesystem is not mounted!
  2. Flash installation media with disk image: 

    # dd if=<RASPBERRY-PI-OS.iso> of=</dev/sdX> status=progress ; sync
